name: The Talking Coloring Book
overview: The Talking Coloring Book, fun and educational software for kids. As the computer speaks the color, both the associated color and word are shown on the screen. Verbally, the computer directs your child to identify the nine primary colors and patiently helps pre-schoolers learn colors and the color words. An picture on the disk may be colored with any combination of nine brilliant colors provided, and no wax chips or peeled labels to clean up! Additional creativity can be exercised in the drawing program. It allows pictures to be drawn, changed, printed and stored to disk.
